name: Thierry Coquand
content:
Thierry Coquand (French: [kɔkɑ̃]; born 18 April 1961 in Jallieu, Isère, France) is a professor in computer science at the University of Gothenburg, Sweden. He is known for his work in constructive mathematics, especially the calculus of constructions. He received his Ph.D. under the supervision of Gérard Huet.
 This biographical article relating to a computer scientist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a French mathematician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
raw:
Thierry Coquand in June 2006
Thierry Coquand (French: [kɔkɑ̃]; born 18 April 1961 in Jallieu, Isère, France) is a professor in computer science at the University of Gothenburg, Sweden. He is known for his work in constructive mathematics, especially the calculus of constructions. He received his Ph.D. under the supervision of Gérard Huet.
